About Us

What is CKO Kickboxing

At CKO Kickboxing, get ready to burn fat, reduce stress and tone up by punching and kicking real heavy bags. Fitness Kickboxing is the number one fat-burning, cardio exercise.

Burn Up to 1,200 Calories in 45 Minutes

Our signature HIIT + Active Rest combination delivers twice the results in half the time. Full-body toning and weight loss guaranteed.

  • Cardio + strength in one session
  • Afterburn effect (24–36 hours)
  • Visible results in weeks

FAQ

Your First Class, Answered

Everything you need to feel confident walking in—and walking out stronger.

Do I need experience?

Not at all. Classes are beginner-friendly, and instructors provide modifications and quick technique cues throughout.

What should I wear?

Comfortable workout clothes and athletic shoes. Bring water. If you don’t have gloves, ask your studio about rentals or purchase options.

Is the first class really free?

Yes. Your first class is free for new guests (studio participation may vary). You’re welcome to decide what’s next after you try it.

How early should I arrive?

Arrive 10 minutes early for your first class. We’ll get you checked in and set up with a bag station.
